entries.text: #0Talk, or Menu-Choose "Talk"-without the Old Witch's Ring equipped
#0Talk-1st time with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
#0Talk-2nd time with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
#0Talk-3rd time with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
Don't mind me. It does not hurt terribly.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
The eggs...it hurts. They've gone still...
I am afraid...it may be too late...
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
I'll be fine, I have you, dear sister.
That you will take care of yourself.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" after gaining Chaos Servant Covenant rank 1
If only I could gaze upon it once more...
I am happy, really. I have you, don't I?
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
It was so very nice to chat.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
#0After leaving abruptly with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
#0Talk-After leaving abruptly with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
#0Upon being attacked, with the Old Witch's Ring equipped-1st time
#0Upon being attacked, with the Old Witch's Ring equipped-2nd time
#0Upon being attacked, with the Old Witch's Ring equipped-3rd time
#0Upon dying, with the Old Witch's Ring equipped
##Don't worry for me. I care only to assist you.
##There must be something I can do?
